metadata.products: DZ; DW; DVX; DV; DUY; DU; DPA; DP; DF2; DF; DE2; DE; DC; DBX; DB

body.body: The sound suppression assembly has been removed from the clutch cover from VIN 803544. The clutch cover without the sound suppression assembly is retrofittable to models from the start of production.
Parts will no longer support the parts for the sound suppression assembly.

body.name: clutch cover sound supression removed abmu 2

body.body: Do not drill or tap the latest condition clutch cover to fit the sound suppression damper.
Attempting to drill or tap the latest condition clutch cover may crack the boss.
A cracked boss will cause oil to leak from the clutch cover.
: The clutch cover does not have threaded holes to fit the sound suppression assembly. The sound suppression assembly must not be fitted to the latest condition clutch cover.
: If any part of the sound suppression assembly requires replacing, remove and discard the assembly and its fixings (parts are no longer available).
If the clutch cover requires replacing, fit the latest condition clutch cover. Do not fit the sound suppression assembly.
When ordering replacement parts, refer to the EPC
When ordering replacement parts, refer to the EPC.
Please mark your copy of the Service Manual with this information.

Please mark your copy of the Service Manual with this information. For electronic service manuals, store this information in a readily accessible place and refer to it often. This information will be included in the next service manual update.

title: Clutch Cover Sound Suppression
